Package gewebe.sandbox.sunflowapiapi

Class P5SunflowAPIAPI

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PImage
processing.core.PGraphics
processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
processing.opengl.PGraphics3D
gewebe.sandbox.sunflowapiapi.P5SunflowAPIAPI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, processing.core.PConstants
public class P5SunflowAPIAPI extends processing.opengl.PGraphics3D
This class glues Sunflow and Processing together. Partly borrowed from Hipsterinc P5Sunflow (http://hipstersinc.com/p5sunflow/)

  • Constructor Details

    • P5SunflowAPIAPI

      public P5SunflowAPIAPI()
      Default constructor. Called by processing

  • Method Details

    • setSize

      public void setSize(int iwidth, int iheight)
      Called in response to a resize event, handles setting the new width and height internally, as well as re-allocating the pixel buffer for the new size. Note that this will nuke any cameraMode() settings. No drawing can happen in this function, and no talking to the graphics context. That is, no glXxxx() calls, or other things that change state.
      Overrides:
      setSize in class processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL

    • beginDraw

    • drawBezierMesh

      public void drawBezierMesh(String name, int subdivs, boolean smooth, boolean quads, int nu, int nv, boolean uwrap, boolean vwrap, float[] points)
      draws a bezier patch
      Parameters:
      name - individual name of primitive
      subdivs - int value of how much subdivisions
      smooth - boolean is bezier patch set to smooth
      quads - boolean if patch uses quads
      nu - number of points in vertical direction
      nv - number of points in horizontal direction
      uwrap - boolean ? best is to use false
      vwrap - boolean ? best is to use false
      points - Float array with coordinates (like [x0,y0,z0,x1,y1,z1,x2,y2,z2])
